alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 8:18PM AKST until February 15 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...NEXT WEATHER FRONT WITH SNOW TO IMPACT SOUTHEAST THROUGH WEDNESDAY... .Snow has started to fall across most of the area except Haines and Skagway as of 8 pm this evening. Expect snow to continue to spread over the area and increase in intensity through the night. Favorable locations for the higher snowfall accumulations are over Yakutat and portions of the Icy Strait Corridor to Juneau. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph near Port Alexander. * WHERE...Hoonah, Tenakee Springs, Angoon, Kake, Port Alexander, and Petersburg areas. * WHEN...until 9 AM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixing with rain is expected Tuesday night in Port Alexander, then Wednesday morning elsewhere.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Admiralty Island; Eastern Chichagof Island; Petersburg Borough; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island
